item.title: BigTable
item.description:
BigTable is a compressed, high performance, and proprietary database system built on Google File System (GFS), Chubby Lock Service, and a few other Google programs; it is currently not distributed or used outside of Google, although Google offers access to it as part of their Google App Engine.

Reference: https://labs.google.com/papers/bigtable.html
item.author: dio

item.title: Amazon SimpleDB
item.description:
Amazon SimpleDB is a distributed database written in Erlang[1] by Amazon.com. It is used as a web service in concert with Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) and Amazon S3 and is part of Amazon Web Services.

Reference: https://aws.amazon.com/simpledb/
item.author: dio
